sentences.en: All this enmity and passion had Pearl inherited, by inalienable right, out of Hester's heart.
sentences.cn: 这一切仇恨和热情,都是珠儿理所当然地从海丝特心中承袭下来的.

sentences.en: He has never permitted her to exercise her inalienable right to the elective franchise.
sentences.cn: 男人从未允许妇女行使其不可剥夺的选举权.

sentences.en: He said the republic now had an inalienable right to self-determination.
sentences.cn: 他说共和国现在拥有不可剥夺的自决权。

sentences.en: I am aware that some will argue that the fetus has an inalienable right to life.
sentences.cn: 我很清楚一些人会争辩说胎儿有不可剥夺的生存权.

sentences.en: It was the inalienable important component in the Mountain Resort.
sentences.cn: 是避暑山庄不可分割的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Literacy may not be an inalienable human right.
sentences.cn: 能读写可能算不得是一项不可剥夺的人权.

sentences.en: Thirdly, all human beings have an inalienable right to self - determination to a certain extent as children.
sentences.cn: 再其次, 每个人都有 自主 的权力.这是一种不可剥夺的权力,在某种意义上儿童亦复如此.
这是一种责无旁贷的义务.

words.tran_cn: 不可分割的；不可剥夺的；不能让与的

trans.tran_cn: 不能转让的，不可分割的，不可剥夺
trans.tran_en: an inalienable right, power etc cannot be taken from you
